title: "Sensor processing unit integrates DSP to run AI algorithms and MEMs sensors on same silicon"
excerpt: "STMicroelectronics announced the launch of the Intelligent Sensor Processing Unit (ISPU) that combines a Digital Signal Processor (DSP) suited to run AI algorithms and MEMS sensor on the same silicon."
